This was a simple challenge, after requesting the free flag i got a 431 error:

```
Error code explanation: HTTPStatus.REQUEST_HEADER_FIELDS_TOO_LARGE - got more than 65536 bytes when reading header line.
```

Capturing the request with burp i notice that we have 98 "bombs" like the one below:
```


....
```

When I captured the request with burp and deleted all the bombs i got the flag: `ictf{don't_byte_off_more_than_you_can_chew!}`
